html:
4.16.20  7:23 pm   How exactly do you make a house a home?

      spend at least 10 days there

4.16.20  6:32 pm   hi can you comment on the fan theory that your 2015 hit "mule thoughts" was an analogy about the war in afghanistan?

      not true

4.16.20  5:01 pm   Is the Mount St. Helens Gift Shop still there?

      yes but it might be closed

4.16.20  4:35 pm   Have you fully learned how to 3D animate?

      no way

4.16.20  4:34 pm   Have you done any bad things?

      that's preposterous. who do you think i am

4.16.20  4:11 pm   whoa there bud DO you need to slow down?

      no

4.16.20  3:30 pm   Do you want cream and sugar with that?

      WITH WHAT

4.16.20  3:27 pm   where do you get your inspiration for a song/idea

      from literally anywhere

4.16.20  3:16 pm   When people offer their own opinion, they call it "their own two cents." When people ask for other opinions, they call it "penny for your thoughts." How do you feel about this?

      those phrases must be very very old, because nowadays 1 or 2 cents has extremely low value

4.16.20  3:13 pm   why are flamingo pink? 

      just in case they were not outrageous enough already

4.16.20  2:17 pm   "have you ever cried at a part of a song you were working on or at least got really emotional" - someone

which song was it? i'm very curious

      could be any song. whenever that happens it's a sign you're doing a good job

4.16.20  2:07 pm   Is the secret project gonna be done this year

     it's not a secret, but i hope not

      or did you miss this years april fools so you are waiting for next year

     april fools is meaningless to me

      and the project will be a 3 second video

     3 second videos has been a tool i have used in the past, throughout this project, as a way to kickstart it into more advanced realms

4.16.20  2:05 pm   when will there be a new video?

      i'm having a countdown timer

4.16.20  1:12 pm   how do you make music without throwing the computer and/or the instruments out the window

      you could start outside, and throw them inside through the window

4.16.20  1:10 pm   what does it mean to be a musician

      to play and/or create music

4.16.20  1:02 pm   what would you call your fashion style?

      sensible

4.16.20  12:49 pm   Who inspires you?

      everyone

4.16.20  12:32 pm   Why are you a person

      i have only just begun to discover

4.16.20  12:19 pm   Why is everything so dumb and stupid?

      due to intelligence

4.16.20  12:13 pm   If plastic is made from oil, and oil comes from dinosaurs, are plastic dinosaurs real dinosaurs?

      no

4.16.20  12:10 pm   Is cereal soup?

      no, but i will admit, it's a hotdog

4.16.20  11:22 am   is the earth round

      oh that would explain a lot

4.16.20  11:14 am   thoughts on time

      seems legit

4.16.20  11:05 am   do you think it's useful to study and compare infinite numbers or finite numbers that are so large that the universe would have become a giant lightless void populated only by black holes by the time you finished computing them, even if you were able to compute 1 digit per Planck time (approx. 1.9*10^-43 seconds)?

      yes

4.16.20  10:59 am   I can't sleep, what do I do?

      try to become even more awake

4.16.20  10:57 am   how old were you when you first started making music, and how long did it take to find your... idk if this is the right word, "artistic identity"?

     always had it, will always look for it. that's because identity is infinity

      did you have any specific inspirations that got u there

     litterally everything. still are

      or did ur brain just kinda inspire itself

     still is

4.16.20  10:38 am   Hello Mr. Wurtz I hope you are staying safe and healthy! I was wondering if you have any tips on how to get better at transcribing chords by ear?

     you could try to just get it note by note for a while, but pretty soon it will just be contagious. the more songs you look at, the more everything will start to become obvious

     Thank you! Please keep doing what you do!

4.16.20  10:08 am   Thoughts on music?

      never heard of it

4.16.20  9:54 am   who's your favorite author?

      could be you

4.16.20  9:34 am   How do you have an answer for everything

      i am extremely old, which means i have had time to learn some knowledge while also developing the ability to make things up

4.16.20  9:25 am   is it too soon to post hints on instagram?

      not by much

4.16.20  9:06 am   Historical fun fact?

      in history, (the past), a lot of people used to say "modern music is not good. it was good at another time, before this"

4.16.20  8:47 am   1th hope you have a great day you work is amazing.
My question is what is an instrument you want to learn or want to get

      camera drones that can perform REPEATABLE programmed movements. timed

4.16.20  8:45 am   are pigs just different cows?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.16.20  8:01 am   What is a hotdog?

      it's like meat on a stick, except the meat is the stick

4.16.20  6:35 am   why are people so curious

      because they think that knowing something new will make them powerful. which is actually true

4.16.20  6:31 am   how do i do anything

      a la mode (with style)

4.16.20  6:15 am   4.15.20  2:46 am
Do you use movie maker or MS paint?

      absolutely not

4.16.20  5:44 am   Hi Bill, I'm a third year physics major and I am split between going into engineering or getting my PhD after I graduate.  What do you think?

      i don't know what a PhD is. but now that i think of it, i don't know what 'going into engineering' means either ...........

4.16.20  5:33 am   how do i do something that i dont like doing?

      figure out WHY

4.16.20  5:25 am   what is the best part of history of the entire world I guess

      the 9 and a half seconds of total darkness and silence

4.16.20  5:22 am   have you ever done LSD?

     no

     if not you should try its fun

4.16.20  5:17 am   how can i be motivated

      what would you like to be motivated to do

4.16.20  3:56 am   I can't stick to a task for long. Do u have any tips?

      you may need some better tasks

4.16.20  3:49 am   I cant sleep and am wondering what your favourite chord is in your songs

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

4.16.20  3:42 am   do you think that an existential crisis is needed to be able to move on from past troubles?

      how about an existential revolution

4.16.20  3:02 am   What is the difference between science and magic? I was thinking it might be that science is organized and magic is disorganized; am I missing anything?

      magic is when you don't know how something happened. science is when you try to figure it out

4.16.20  2:40 am   how long have you been making songs?

     since as long as i can remember

     was it something hard to do at first?

      no but it became hard to do at various other points along the way

4.16.20  2:12 am   I want to write music for films but I'm only 19 and still in college. Any tips

     start writing music to go along with films (or the modern version of films..... 'videos')

     or should I give up

     seems like you've barely even started yet

4.16.20  2:11 am   why is art important?

      because it might be the only way to actually say everything
